text: Brooklyn Beckham and ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, two barely - twentysomethings who found love in SoulCycle class, appear to be done. They didn't announce the breakup on social media or anything, but Beckham did just introduce the paparazzi to Moretz's successor, 19 - year - old model Lexi Wood. They were photographed kissing in the window of Honorable Society Tattoo Parlor in West Hollywood Saturday, where Beckham was getting a new tattoo of a pinup girl. BACKGRID Meanwhile, Moretz shared an Instagram story of herself listening to Cardi B's ` ` Be Careful'' the day the kissing photos surfaced.
